snippet: James Dobbins, a diplomat with a history of difficult assignments, will be appointed as special representative for the troubled region, an administration official said.
abstract: Pres Obama names James F Dobbins, diplomat with a history of difficult assignments, as his third special representative for Afghanistan and Pakistan.
lead_paragraph: James Dobbins, a diplomat with a history of difficult assignments, will be appointed as special representative for the troubled region, an administration official said.

headline.seo: James Dobbins to Be Named Representative for Afghanistan and Pakistan
headline.main: Obama Names Veteran Troubleshooter to Afghanistan-Pakistan Post
headline.print_headline: Obama Names Diplomat for Afghanistan-Pakistan Post
